Moving to Medium

Posted on October 11, 2024

Moving to Medium

Posted on October 11, 2024

After all the shenanigans over at WordPress, I've decided to start publishing on Medium. You can follow me there if you like. I have 15 subscribers here, so I'll probably be importing you over there after the waiting period is over. I don't know yet all the ins-and-outs of how Medium works so hopefully it doesn't require you to pay to read my stuff! (Update: I think it only does this if the author chooses to monetize, which I won't. If you discover otherwise, email me please. I can send gift links.)
